LanguageData.PES_CaravanDismiss: {0} is no longer heading towards our colony and tracked by our reconnaissance system.
LanguageData.PES_PrisonerDead: {0} is getting really angry now because one of the prisoner they want is dead. They will now revenge on the colony.
LanguageData.PES_AllSlaveDead: {0} changes their raiding goal to Extortion, because all the colonists they want to enslave are dead.
